min_pay_percentage.description: The percentage of total balance calculated for min pay. (i.e. 20 means 20%)

payment_due_interval.description: The amount of time before statement cut that the payment should be due for the billing cycle. IE '5 days'. Cannot exceed the duration of the billing cycle.

roll_to_amortization.description: Set false for revolving products. If applicable, a boolean to indicate whether an account's balance rolls to amortization. Note - if there are any promotions configured for the product, it will roll to amortization *at the end of the promotion*. Otherwise, as in a standard installment product, it will roll to amortization upon origination.

automated_status_updates.description: Status changes for missed payments to correspond to index in array + 1. For example, ['current', 'delinquent', 'delinquent', 'default'] would keep the account status as `current` after the first consecutive missed payment, set it to `delinquent` after the second consecutive missed payment, and set it to `default` after the fourth.

description: The set of policies governing payment due information for the product.
